description: Jade Indica and Sabrina Fox suffer through a BDSM gauntlet that goes on and on for several hours straight.The little mercy they get is spent locked up tight in unyielding iron restraints that contort their bodies, holding them rigidly helpless, vulnerable, completely exposed and humiliated in front of a live audience, actively chiming in with ever more increasingly sadistic requests.Pig tail shaped ass plugs, face distorting nose hooks, gags, girl on girl cunt licking all with the women under the total control iron and steel provide.
title: Jade Indica and Sabrina Fox Live, Part 1
